appName: Chimps Life ( Discontinued and Replaced with Chimps Life Remastered )
displayName: Chimps Life ( Discontinued and Replaced with Chimps Life Remastered )
display_name: Chimps Life ( Discontinued and Replaced with Chimps Life Remastered )
display_long_description:
Chimp's Life presents an immersive gaming experience, introducing a locomotion movement system that draws inspiration from the beloved Gorilla Tag mechanic. This unique locomotion system injects an exhilarating sense of movement, adding a layer of dynamism that sets the game apart.

Embarking on your journey, you'll traverse a series of meticulously designed maps that promise both challenge and discovery. What sets Chimp's Life further apart is its ingenious departure from convention—a distinctive tablet interface supplants the conventional computer-driven mechanics seen in similar titles. This innovative touch underscores the game's commitment to breaking new ground.

Your investment in Chimp's Life will be met with a gameplay experience that has been refined over a significant period. The fruits of this labor have yielded a visually stunning and captivating game that is both pleasing to the eye and satisfying to the senses.

Within the heart of the game lies a simulation, a world where you, as a chimp, awaken with a heightened sense of self-awareness. As your perception sharpens, you become acutely aware of an unsettling undercurrent—a disruption that ripples through the very fabric of the simulation. Driven by a desire to uncover the truth, your chimp protagonist embarks on an exploratory journey. With each step, revelations unfold, leading you to an unexpected destination—an expansive underground structure teeming with enigmas and untold stories.
